files.README.md:
# claude-plugin

My personal [Claude Code](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/claude-code) plugin. Contains tools, skills, and workflows I use day-to-day.

## Installation

```bash
# Add the marketplace
/plugin marketplace add galligan/claude-plugin

# Install the plugin
/plugin install mg@galligan
```

## Plugins

### mg

Personal tools and skills.

#### Skills

- **voice** â€” Writes content in my authentic voice: curious practitioner, builder's mindset, concrete specificity over abstraction. Use `/mg:voice` or let Claude auto-trigger when drafting content.
